content.text: Good, I can see the `cards` table has `frameVersion`, `convertedManaCost`, and `name` columns. Now let me query for the top three 2003-frame cards by converted mana cost.

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "SELECT name, convertedManaCost FROM cards WHERE frameVersion = '2003' ORDER BY convertedManaCost DESC LIMIT 5;"
input.description: Get top 5 cards by converted mana cost with 2003 frame
